name: Interprovinciaal Overleg
goal: Looking as IPO: umbrella organization of the twelve Dutch regeional governments after the interests and policy areas of the Dutch regional governments in The Hague and in Brussels with the European Institutions
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Borders and Security, Budget, Climate Action, Competition, Culture, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Institutional affairs, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Energy and Climate
Environment
biodiversity
Agriculture
regional economic development
mobility and transport
research and development
